snippet: Last week, Pakistan reported 202 cases of paralysis from polio, the first time in 14 years the figure topped 200.
abstract: World Health Organization reports that polio is surging in Pakistan, frustrating health workers who have tried to combat disease; efforts have been hindered by conflict and lack of political leadership.
lead_paragraph: Last week, Pakistan reported 202 cases of paralysis from polio, the first time in 14 years the figure topped 200.

headline.print_headline: Polio on the Rise Again in Pakistan, Officials Say
headline.main: Polio on the Rise Again in Pakistan, Officials Say
